column5: I usually don't forward-forward sites that people email that "I just gotta see" but these are awesome.  http://www.rivermenrodandgunclub.com/cool-and-different-pictures.html  I'm not a member of that site or trying to promote anything, just thought guys would enjoy the shots.  If its been posted before, apologies.
No need to apologize. I was quite happy to see them again. Amazing photos.  Cheers
Love the karelian bear dog shot...I gotta get one...
Amazing shots. I loved the intense bear!
